# Comparison with @magnetic/checkbox

|                        | MDS | CDS  |
| ---------------------- | --- | ---- |
| default                | ✅  | ✅   |
| checked                | ✅  | ✅   |
| indeterminate          | ✅  | ✅   |
| disabled (on 3 states) | ✅  | ✅   |
| size                   | ✅  | ✅\* |

> 1 - Available sizes are `sm` and `md`, using css classes

Props:

- `checked`;
- `disabled`;
- `indeterminate`;

> Sentiment for the checkbox component is set to control (no options available).
